SectionBody.Text: The agency shall assess fees on certificate-of-need applications. Such fees shall be for the purpose of funding the activities of the agency and shall be allocated as provided in s. 408.033. The fee shall be determined as follows:

Subsection.Text: In addition to the base fee of $10,000, 0.015 of each dollar of proposed expenditure, except that a fee may not exceed $50,000.
